severities.name: none
severities.description: Do not show anything to the user when this rule is violated. Code generation features generate code in this style, however. Rules with none severity never appear in the Quick Actions and Refactorings menu. In most cases, this is considered "disabled" or "ignored".

severities.name: silent
severities.description: Do not show anything to the user when this rule is violated. Code generation features generate code in this style, however. Rules with silent severity participate in cleanup as well as appear in the Quick Actions and Refactorings menu.

severities.name: suggestion
severities.description: When this style is not being followed, show it to the user as a suggestion (underlying dots on the first two characters).

severities.name: warning
severities.description: When this style is not being followed, show a compiler warning (green squiggle).

severities.name: error
severities.description: When this style is not being followed, show a compiler error (red squiggle).

properties.name: root
properties.description: Special property that should be specified at the top of the file outside of any sections. Set to "true" to stop .editorconfig files search on current file.

properties.name: charset
properties.description: File character encoding.

properties.name: end_of_line
properties.description: Line ending file format (Unix, DOS, Mac).

properties.name: indent_style
properties.description: Indentation style.

properties.name: indent_size
properties.description: A whole number defining the number of columns used for each indentation level and the width of soft tabs (when supported). When set to tab, the value of tab_width (if specified) will be used.

properties.name: insert_final_newline
properties.description: Denotes whether file should end with a newline.

properties.name: tab_width
properties.description: A whole number defining the number of columns used to represent a tab character. This defaults to the value of indent_size and doesn't usually need to be specified.

properties.name: trim_trailing_whitespace
properties.description: Denotes whether to trim whitespace at the end of lines.

properties.name: max_line_length
properties.description: Forces hard line wrapping after the amount of characters specified.

properties.name: dotnet_separate_import_directive_groups
properties.description: Separate using directive groups.

properties.name: dotnet_sort_system_directives_first
properties.description: Prefer to place 'System' directives first when sorting usings.

properties.name: dotnet_style_coalesce_expression
properties.description: Prefer null coalescing expression to ternary operator checking (e.g. 'var v = x ?? y;').

properties.name: dotnet_style_collection_initializer
properties.description: Prefer collections to be initialized using collection initializers when possible (e.g., 'var list = new List<int>{ 1, 2, 3 };').

properties.name: dotnet_style_explicit_tuple_names
properties.description: Prefer tuple names to ItemX properties (e.g., '(string name, int age) customer = GetCustomer(); var name = customer.name;').

properties.name: dotnet_style_null_propagation
properties.description: Prefer to use null-conditional operator where possible (e.g., 'var v = o?.ToString();').

properties.name: dotnet_style_object_initializer
properties.description: Prefer objects to be initialized using object initializers when possible (e.g., 'var c = new Customer(){ Age = 21 };').

properties.name: dotnet_style_parentheses_in_arithmetic_binary_operators
properties.description: Prefer parentheses to clarify arithmetic operator (*, /, %, +, -, <<, >>, &, ^, |) precedence.

properties.name: dotnet_style_parentheses_in_other_binary_operators
properties.description: Prefer parentheses to clarify other binary operator (&&, ||, ??) precedence.

properties.name: dotnet_style_parentheses_in_other_operators
properties.description: Prefer parentheses to clarify operator precedence.

properties.name: dotnet_style_parentheses_in_relational_binary_operators
properties.description: Prefer parentheses to clarify relational operator (>, <, <=, >=, is, as, ==, !=) precedence .

properties.name: dotnet_style_predefined_type_for_locals_parameters_members
properties.description: For locals, parameters and type members, prefer types that have a language keyword to represent them (int, double, string, etc.) to use that keyword instead of the type name (Int32, Int64, etc.).

properties.name: dotnet_style_predefined_type_for_member_access
properties.description: Prefer the keyword whenever a member-access expression is used on a type with a keyword representation (int, double, string, etc.).

properties.name: dotnet_style_prefer_auto_properties
properties.description: Prefer auto-properties over properties with private backing fields.

properties.name: dotnet_style_prefer_compound_assignment
properties.description: This style rule concerns with the use of compound assignments. The option value specifies whether or not they are desired.

properties.name: dotnet_style_prefer_conditional_expression_over_assignment
properties.description: Prefer assignments with a ternary conditional over an if-else statement.

properties.name: dotnet_style_prefer_conditional_expression_over_return
properties.description: Prefer return statements to use a ternary conditional over an if-else statement.

properties.name: dotnet_style_prefer_inferred_anonymous_type_member_names
properties.description: Prefer inferred anonymous type member names.

properties.name: dotnet_style_prefer_inferred_tuple_names
properties.description: Prefer inferred tuple element names.

properties.name: dotnet_style_prefer_is_null_check_over_reference_equality_method
properties.description: Prefer using a null check with pattern-matching over object.ReferenceEquals.

properties.name: dotnet_style_prefer_simplified_boolean_expressions
properties.description: This style rule concerns with simplification of conditional expressions that return constant value true or false versus retaining conditional expressions with explicit true or false return values.

properties.name: dotnet_style_prefer_simplified_interpolation
properties.description: This style rule concerns with simplification of interpolated strings to improve code readability. It recommends removal of certain explicit method calls, such as ToString(), when the same method would be implicitly invoked by the compiler if the explicit method call is removed.

properties.name: dotnet_style_qualification_for_event
properties.description: Prefer all non-static events referenced from within non-static methods to be prefaced with 'this.' in C# and 'Me.' in Visual Basic.

properties.name: dotnet_style_qualification_for_field
properties.description: Prefer all non-static fields used in non-static methods to be prefaced with 'this.' in C# or 'Me.' in Visual Basic.

properties.name: dotnet_style_qualification_for_method
properties.description: Prefer all non-static methods called from within non-static methods to be prefaced with 'this.' in C# and 'Me.' in Visual Basic.

properties.name: dotnet_style_qualification_for_property
properties.description: Prefer the all non-static properties used in non-static methods to be prefaced with 'this.' in C# or 'Me.' in Visual Basic.

properties.name: dotnet_style_readonly_field
properties.description: Prefer that fields should be marked with 'readonly' in C# or ReadOnly in Visual Basic if they are only ever assigned inline, or inside of a constructor.

properties.name: dotnet_style_require_accessibility_modifiers
properties.description: Prefer accessibility modifiers to be specified

properties.name: csharp_indent_case_contents
properties.description: Indent switch case contents.

properties.name: csharp_indent_case_contents_when_block
properties.description: Indent switch case contents, when the content is a single block.

properties.name: csharp_indent_labels
properties.description: Label positioning.

properties.name: csharp_indent_switch_labels
properties.description: Indent switch labels.

properties.name: csharp_new_line_before_catch
properties.description: Place catch on new line.

properties.name: csharp_new_line_before_else
properties.description: Place else on new line.

properties.name: csharp_new_line_before_finally
properties.description: Place finally on new line.

properties.name: csharp_new_line_before_members_in_anonymous_types
properties.description: Place members in anonymous types on new line.

properties.name: csharp_new_line_before_members_in_object_initializers
properties.description: Place members in object initializers on new line.

properties.name: csharp_new_line_before_open_brace
properties.description: Place new line before open brace

properties.name: csharp_new_line_between_query_expression_clauses
properties.description: Place query expression clauses on new line.

properties.name: csharp_preferred_modifier_order
properties.description: Prefer the specified ordering of modifiers.

properties.name: csharp_prefer_braces
properties.description: Prefer braces when possible.

properties.name: csharp_prefer_simple_default_expression
properties.description: Prefer default over default(T).

properties.name: csharp_prefer_simple_using_statement
properties.description: This style rule concerns the use of using statements without curly braces. This alternative syntax was introduced in C# 8.0.

properties.name: csharp_style_implicit_object_creation_when_type_is_apparent
properties.description: Prefer target-typed new expressions when created type is apparent.

properties.name: csharp_prefer_static_local_function
properties.description: Prefer local functions to be marked static.

properties.name: csharp_preserve_single_line_blocks
properties.description: Leave block on single line.

properties.name: csharp_preserve_single_line_statements
properties.description: Leave statements and member declarations on the same line.

properties.name: csharp_space_after_cast
properties.description: Require a space between a cast and the value.

properties.name: csharp_space_after_colon_in_inheritance_clause
properties.description: Require a space after the colon for bases or interfaces in a type declaration.

properties.name: csharp_space_after_keywords_in_control_flow_statements
properties.description: Space after keywords in control flow statements.

properties.name: csharp_space_around_binary_operators
properties.description: Spaces around binary operators.

properties.name: csharp_space_before_colon_in_inheritance_clause
properties.description: Require a space before the colon for bases or interfaces in a type declaration.

properties.name: csharp_space_between_method_call_empty_parameter_list_parentheses
properties.description: Require a space within empty argument list parentheses.

properties.name: csharp_space_between_method_call_name_and_opening_parenthesis
properties.description: Require a space between method call name and opening parenthesis.

properties.name: csharp_space_between_method_call_parameter_list_parentheses
properties.description: Space within parentheses for method call argument list.

properties.name: csharp_space_between_method_declaration_empty_parameter_list_parentheses
properties.description: Require a space within empty parameter list parentheses for a method declaration

properties.name: csharp_space_between_method_declaration_parameter_list_parentheses
properties.description: Space between method declaration argument-list parentheses.

properties.name: csharp_space_between_parentheses
properties.description: Space within parentheses for other options.

properties.name: csharp_style_conditional_delegate_call
properties.description: Prefer to use conditional coalescing operation (?.) when invoking a lambda instead of performing a null check (e.g., 'func?.Invoke(args);').

properties.name: csharp_style_deconstructed_variable_declaration
properties.description: Prefer deconstructed variable declaration.

properties.name: csharp_style_expression_bodied_accessors
properties.description: Prefer expression-bodied members for accessors (e.g., 'public int Age { get => _age; set => _age = value; }').

properties.name: csharp_style_expression_bodied_constructors
properties.description: Prefer expression-bodied members for constructors (e.g., 'public Customer(int age) => Age = age;').

properties.name: csharp_style_expression_bodied_indexers
properties.description: Prefer expression-bodied members for indexers (e.g., 'public T this[int i] => _value[i];').

properties.name: csharp_style_expression_bodied_lambdas
properties.description: Prefer expression-bodied members for indexers (e.g., 'public T this[int i] => _value[i];').

properties.name: csharp_style_expression_bodied_local_functions
properties.description: Prefer expression-bodied members for indexers (e.g., 'public T this[int i] => _value[i];').

properties.name: csharp_style_expression_bodied_methods
properties.description: Prefer expression-bodied members for methods (e.g., 'public int GetAge() => this.Age;').

properties.name: csharp_style_expression_bodied_operators
properties.description: Prefer expression-bodied members for operators.

properties.name: csharp_style_expression_bodied_properties
properties.description: Prefer expression-bodied members for properties (e.g., 'public int Age => _age;').

properties.name: csharp_style_prefer_index_operator
properties.description: This style rule concern the use of the index-from-end operator, which is available in C# 8.0 and later.

properties.name: csharp_style_prefer_not_pattern
properties.description: This style rule concerns the use of C# 9.0 'not' pattern, when possible.

properties.name: csharp_style_prefer_pattern_matching
properties.description: This style rule concerns the use of C# 9.0 pattern matching constructs, when possible.

properties.name: csharp_style_prefer_switch_expression
properties.description: This style rule concerns the use of switch expressions versus switch statements.

properties.name: csharp_style_inlined_variable_declaration
properties.description: Prefer 'out' variables to be declared inline when possible (e.g., 'if (int.TryParse(value out int i) {...}').

properties.name: csharp_style_pattern_local_over_anonymous_function
properties.description: Prefer local functions over anonymous functions.

properties.name: csharp_style_pattern_matching_over_as_with_null_check
properties.description: Prefer pattern matching instead of 'as' expressions with null-checks to determine if something is of a particular type (e.g., 'if (o is string s) {...}').

properties.name: csharp_style_pattern_matching_over_is_with_cast_check
properties.description: Prefer pattern matching instead of 'is' expressions with type casts (e.g., 'if (o is int i) {...}').

properties.name: csharp_style_prefer_range_operator
properties.description: This style rule concern the use of the range operator, which is available in C# 8.0 and later.

properties.name: csharp_style_throw_expression
properties.description: Prefer to use 'throw' expressions instead of 'throw' statements.

properties.name: csharp_style_unused_value_assignment_preference
properties.description: This rule flags unnecessary value assignments.

properties.name: csharp_style_var_elsewhere
properties.description: Prefer 'var' in all cases unless overridden by another code style rule.

properties.name: csharp_style_var_for_built_in_types
properties.description: Prefer 'var' is used for built-in system types such as 'int'.

properties.name: csharp_style_var_when_type_is_apparent
properties.description: Prefer 'var' when the type is already mentioned on the right-hand side of a declaration expression.

properties.name: csharp_using_directive_placement
properties.description: Prefer 'using' directives to be inside or outside a namespace.

properties.name: visual_basic_preferred_modifier_order
properties.description: Prefer the specified ordering of modifiers.

properties.name: dotnet_naming_rule.<naming_rule_title>.severity
properties.description: Naming rule severity.

properties.name: dotnet_naming_rule.<naming_rule_title>.symbols
properties.description: Naming rule symbols.

properties.name: dotnet_naming_rule.<naming_rule_title>.style
properties.description: Naming rule style.

properties.name: dotnet_naming_symbols.<naming_symbols_title>.applicable_kinds
properties.description: Application kinds. Must match any.

properties.name: dotnet_naming_symbols.<naming_symbols_title>.applicable_accessibilities
properties.description: Applicable accessibilities. Must match any

properties.name: dotnet_naming_symbols.<naming_symbols_title>.required_modifiers
properties.description: Required modifiers. Must match all.

properties.name: dotnet_naming_style.<naming_style_title>.required_prefix
properties.description: Required prefix.

properties.name: dotnet_naming_style.<naming_style_title>.required_suffix
properties.description: Required suffix.

properties.name: dotnet_naming_style.<naming_style_title>.word_separator
properties.description: Word separator.

properties.name: dotnet_naming_style.<naming_style_title>.capitalization
properties.description: Capitalization.

properties.name: dotnet_diagnostic.<rule_id>.severity
properties.description: Diagnostic rule configuration

properties.name: dotnet_analyzer_diagnostic.severity
properties.description: Default diagnostic severity configuration

properties.name: dotnet_analyzer_diagnostic.category-<category>.severity
properties.description: Diagnostic severity configuration by category

properties.name: dotnet_remove_unnecessary_suppression_exclusions
properties.description: Diagnostic severity configuration by category

properties.name: dotnet_code_quality_unused_parameters
properties.description: This rule concerns with flagging unused parameters. The option value determines if unused parameters should be flagged only for non-public methods or for both public and non-public methods.

properties.name: csharp_indent_block_contents
properties.description: Undocumented property

properties.name: csharp_indent_braces
properties.description: Undocumented property

properties.name: csharp_space_after_comma
properties.description: Undocumented property

properties.name: csharp_space_after_dot
properties.description: Undocumented property

properties.name: csharp_space_after_semicolon_in_for_statement
properties.description: Undocumented property

properties.name: csharp_space_around_declaration_statements
properties.description: Undocumented property

properties.name: csharp_space_before_comma
properties.description: Undocumented property

properties.name: csharp_space_before_dot
properties.description: Undocumented property

properties.name: csharp_space_before_open_square_brackets
properties.description: Undocumented property

properties.name: csharp_space_before_semicolon_in_for_statement
properties.description: Undocumented property

properties.name: csharp_space_between_empty_square_brackets
properties.description: Undocumented property

properties.name: csharp_space_between_method_declaration_name_and_open_parenthesis
properties.description: Undocumented property

properties.name: csharp_space_between_square_brackets
properties.description: Undocumented property
